Text: 2.3 MB is pretty small for a 1 hour show; I highly doubt this is legit.

oh never mind, it's audio apparently.  Anyway, the "Gay" episode is the latest in the "New Voyages/Phase II" series, though it was orignally written for TNG.  Therefore, it doesn't feature Shatner and Nimoy.
actually this is Drew and Mike's morning radio show---lots of soundbites from the original series, edited together--very very funny
This effn hysterically funny! I have it on cassette. But I desperately want it in my iTunes, so PLEASE keep seeding.
